divs: Sighting DetailsI was getting out of a car to go into my house when I looked up and saw three objects in the sky glowing orange and appearing to travel in the same direction. The objects appeared to be triangular in shape. I took a video of this as well as a picture with my Iphone.
trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Chilliwack
There were no other sightings in Chilliwack on or around April 12th 2013
Summary: 3 orange objects flying in formation - not aircraft. no flashing beacon or lights.
